Well, but it can lead to stomach cramps and diarrhea. : I decided to change my diet, so my mum found this sugar substitute. My mum and I are very satisfied with it. It can also be used for baking. However, I have found that I get diarrhea and abdominal cramps in one tbsp of this sugar in tea. So you should use the sugar very sparingly. Therefore a point deduction.

The alarm clock does what it should : The Yissvic Digital-Alarm has a large LED display, easily readable even from a few meters away. The clock does what it should - time. The accuracy of the clock still has to be checked. Night parts: The LEDs are not as uniformly illuminated as on the offer picture and that one cannot replace the backup button battery is probably a design error.

Light, compact and top quality : I love to ride the eBike and have always had my GoPro and mobile phone camera with me. Since I have the EOS M50 in my luggage I can even make movies in top quality with an external micro. The EOS M50 with the EF-M 22mm 1:2 STM Pancake lens is the best choice to create films in very good quality even with little light. The biggest advantage is the compact design and the very low weight. I will soon get the zoom lens EF-M 55-200 mm to better light even some distant buildings. Conclusion Very recommended
